Actions.Name: Check In SharePoint Document
Actions.Description: Check-in a SharePoint document at the specified URL

Actions.Name: Check Out SharePoint Document
Actions.Description: Check-out a SharePoint document at the specified URL

Actions.Name: Copy SharePoint Document by URL
Actions.Description: Copy a document from the document URL to a specific library URL

Actions.Name: Copy SharePoint Folder By URL
Actions.Description: Copy a SharePoint folder from the document library to the specified URL

Actions.Name: Create SharePoint Folder in List
Actions.Description: Creates a new SharePoint folder in the document library using the specified path.

Actions.Name: Create SharePoint Folder by URL
Actions.Description: Creates a new SharePoint folder in the document library by the specified URL.

Actions.Name: Enable List Version Control
Actions.Description: Enable version control for list or library

Actions.Name: Move SharePoint Document by URL
Actions.Description: Move a document from the document URL to a specific library URL

Actions.Name: Move SharePoint Folder URL
Actions.Description: Move a SharePoint folder from the document library to the specified URL

Actions.Name: Remove SharePoint Document by URL
Actions.Description: Copy a document from the document URL.

Actions.Name: Remove Sharepoint  Folder by URL
Actions.Description: Remove folder from Sharepoint library by URL
